sideBar.80message: Complete 80% to let your profile be shown on Staff and qualify for better options.

dashboard.text1: Increase your chances to be seen by adding an speciality area and skills.
dashboard.text2: Once you complete your profile by 80% other users will see you in our Staff section - Otherwise you'll be notified that other users are trying to see your profile-
dashboard.text3: Becoming Rombus Corporate Staff or Project Manager will increase your opportunities. Go ahead and complete your profile 100% and postulate by contacting us.
dashboard.text4: Become Rombus Representative will turn you into exclusive contact point in your location, contact us to coordinate.
dashboard.text5: Need an office and want to share your time, take advantage great discounts in our Coworking places - if you want to become a coworker just let us know!
dashboard.text6: We're starting several activites and new features will come very soon, we will keep you posted!
